question: Can I wear a wig to please my husband ONLY during intercourse?
answer:
QUESTION
Can I wear a wig to please my husband ONLY during intercourse? I read in a previous fatwa that certain sex toys are permissible, would a wig be classified as one of them? I would only use the wig for the time in the bedroom and would never use it for any other purpose
ANSWER


Share:

It is permissible for you to wear a synthetic wig when in the confines of your home for your husband.

And Allah Knows Best

Muhammed Zakariyya Desai
Student: Darul Ifta

Checked and Approved: Mufti Emraan Vawda
